name: Workaholic (Trang Nguyen)
description:
Workaholic  is a short, cute pixel platform game. The game doesn't require intense focus or gaming experience, so just sit back, relax, and enjoy.

Featuring:

  • Cute pixel arts.
  • Neutral color palette to prevent eye strain.
  • Simple mechanics - anyone can play.
  • Multiple endings.
  • Friendly guide.
  • Doesn't take more than 20 minutes to complete. Perfect for a short break during work/study!

Contact: noonandself@gmail.com
